QuestData.Title: A Monument to the Fallen
QuestData.Description: Bring these fragments to Njormeld. He will use the pieces of that sacred relic in the construction of a mighty monument.$b$bMay it soothe the pains and heal the scars my people have borne these many years.$b$bMay its presence help to bring about a new age that sees us once again in glorious battle at Thorim's side.$b$bGo now, $c. Njormeld awaits you.
QuestData.LogDescription: King Jokkum wants you to bring Hodir's Horn Fragments to Njormeld in Dun Niffelem.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have brought the fragments of Hodir's Horn, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: <Njormeld's eyes become noticeably moist as he pours the contents of the bag onto the anvil.>$b$bThe Horn of Hodir....$b$bThis was a sacred gift to our people from Hodir himself, $r. It is a relic of great importance to us.$b$bWhen you next return to our stronghold you shall see the fruits of your labor.$b$bFarewell.
